conclusion: Analyze the flow of liquid through the baffles to predict which container it will flow into.
Identify the starting point of the liquid flow indicated by arrows labeled A, B, and C.
Observe the direction of the liquid flow through the baffles from A, B, and C.
Liquid will flow from A, B, and C into the container labeled D.
Determine which container (D, E, F, or G) is positioned directly below the starting point of the liquid flow.
Since the liquid flows from A, B, and C into the container labeled D, container D will receive the liquid.
Verify that the flow direction and the container's position align with the given image.
